author: perezhilton
title: Joe Jonas Strips Down To His Underwear In Blazing Hot Guess Ads | CocoPerez.com
text:
Hoo boy, it just got really hot in here!
Remember when Nick Jonas released those sexy as hell picture of him in his undies? Well, his older brother Joe Jonas has just gifted us with similar images and we are now having a wonderful hump day!
Related: Joe & Sophie Turner Made Out At Golden Globes Party
The singer stars alongside model Charlotte McKinney in Guess underwear ads that are SCORCHING!
So scorching, in fact, that Joe hugs a fan to keep himself cool. Even though the fan isn't running.
Look, whatever, we didn't art direct this. Just enjoy the pics, okay?
[I mage via Guess ]
Tags: ad campaigns , body , fashion smashion , joe jonas , nick jonas , yummy yummy screw
